earn.title: How to Earn
earn.subtitle: Unleash the power of decentralized NFT marketplaces

earnCard.firstItemSubLabel: Get early access on products, vip lounge, newsletters, early opportunities, discounts, and membership rewards
earnCard.secondItemSubLabel: Mint your NFTs as little as $1 for listing/storage fee and 2.5% transaction fee for every purchase
earnCard.thirdItemSubLabel: Collect from different marketplaces and manage collectibles via Xircus Mobiel and Xircus TV apps
earnCard.fourthItemSubLabel: Deploy your NFT marketplace, customize your fees and themes, create staking opportunities for your customers
earnCard.fifthItemSubLabel: Earn from deploying APIs to cached data for marketplaces
earnCard.sixthItemSubLabel: Earn from helping creators mint their creation
